mapper.select: select am.*, user1.user_name as apply_user_name, user2.user_name as approve_user_name, code1.value as actition_type, code1.display_cn as actition_type_cn, code1.display_en as actition_type_en, code2.display_cn as approve_status_cn, code2.display_en as approve_status_en from act_master am LEFT JOIN act_template at ON am.temp_id = at.temp_id LEFT JOIN sys_user user1 ON am.apply_user_id = user1.login_id LEFT JOIN sys_user user2 ON am.approve_user_id = user2.login_id LEFT JOIN com_code code1 ON code1.code = 'ACTITION_TYPE' and at.actition_type = code1.value LEFT JOIN com_code code2 ON code2.code = 'APPROVE_STATUS' and am.approve_status = code2.value WHERE am.activity_id = #{activityId}
SELECT count(*) FROM act_master am WHERE am.activity_name = #{activityName} AND am.deleted = '0'

select am.activity_id, am.temp_id, at.actition_type as activity_type, am.activity_name, am.goods_type, am.is_origin_price, am.has_sub_activity, am.member_type, am.need_point, am.need_fee from act_master am left join act_template at on am.temp_id = at.temp_id where am.unit='20' and am.approve_status = '20' and am.start_time <= now() and am.end_time >= now() and am.deleted = '0'

select am.activity_id, am.temp_id, at.actition_type as activity_type, at.temp_name, am.activity_name, am.goods_type, am.need_fee, am.is_member_activity, am.member_type, am.start_time, am.end_time from act_master am left join act_template at on am.temp_id = at.temp_id where am.activity_id = #{activityId}
select distinct sell_year from view_erp_goods order by sell_year DESC
select distinct season_code,season_name from view_erp_goods where sell_year = #{year} order by season_code ASC
select distinct brand_code, brand_name from view_erp_goods order by brand_code DESC
select distinct line_code,line_name from view_erp_goods order by line_code DESC
